content: green stripe for red scarf© by my merino mantra 2008 trish johnson if you need a quick crocheted scarf pattern for the red scarf project this one fits the bill the scarf is crocheted lengthwise using single_crochet through the back loop easy peasy here are two versions green scarf yarn handspun two-ply 100 % wool 5-1/2 oz 158 g hook size j 450 yds gauge no one cares ok then 11 single_crochet / 4 inches dimensions 76 inches x 5 inches 1 abbreviations single_crochet single_crochet mc main color chain - chain tbl through the back loop cc contrast color for green scarf chain 195 turn row 1 single_crochet tbl across chain 1 turn row 2 26 repeat row 1 bind off for the green handspun variegated version just take a nap while you crochet i did stripes occur magically tasselly-fringe things not just for cats for green scarf version if fringe is desired pre-cut 140 pieces of 14-inch yarn i used a 7-inch square piece of cardboard and wrapped the yarn around it cut yarn at the bottom edge set far aside where cats and kids can t get into it finish scarf use five pieces of pre-cut yarn if you can still find them for each tassel fold in half and attach at ends of scarf at each ridge trim edges even for red scarf version pre-cut 50 pieces of 14-inch yarn use five pieces of yarn folded in half for each tassel placing one tassel at the end of each color stripe on both ends of scarf note you will need about 20 yds for the fringe if using just mc for fringe you may not need the 2nd skein of cc 2 for red scarf paton s shetland chunky tweed 72% acrylic 25% wool and 3% viscose 108 yds / 3 oz / 85g per skein will need 2 skeins mc 2 skeins cc hook size n gauge 8 single_crochet/4 inches dimensions measures 70 inches x 6 inches chain 140 with mc turn row 1 single_crochet tbl across chain 1 turn row 2-3 repeat row 1 row 4 single_crochet tbl across change to cc chain 1 turn row 5-7 repeat row 1 row 8 single_crochet tbl across change to mc chain 1 turn row 9-11 repeat row 1 row 12 repeat row 4 row 13-15 repeat row 1 row 16 repeat row 8 row 17-20 repeat row 1 bind off feel good about yourself by donating your work to the red scarf project ** red scarf project scarves must be a minimum of 5-inches wide ** please see orphan org for more details thank you trish http //mymerinomantra typepad com copyright 2008 all rights reserved 3
